a-na {LU₂}EN.NAM be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-BAD₃-PAB lu DI-mu a-na be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU ṭe₃-mu ša LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} {LU₂}A-KIN-ia {LU₂}A-KIN-ia ša ina {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} aš₂-pur-an-ni ina {URU}bu-ra-a-ti it-ta-lak šu-tu UD x-KAM₂ is-su-hur ma-a LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} u₂-tam-mi-iš {LU₂}A-KIN-šu₂ {LU₂}A-KIN-šu₂ a-na {KUR}par-su-ma-aš₂ i-sap-ra ma-a x x x-ia-a i-da-ak-ki-i ina UGU x+x x x x x x+x ma-a {1}um-man-mi-na-a {LU₂}NIGIR₂ x x x TA {1}bur-si-la-a ina {URU}E₂-bu-nak-ka re-eš ZID₂.DA.KASKAL.2 i-na-aš₂-ši-iu ma-a ina UGU DUMU {1}dal-ta-a x x x ma-a LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} il-la-ka a-na {URU}E₂-bu-nak-ka u₂-ṣa-a re-eš {GIŠ}GIGIR-MEŠ-šu₂ TA LUGAL ina {URU}E₂-bu-nak-ka it-ta-al-ku ma-a x x x me a-na pa-an x x x i-ṭe₃-en i-ṭe₃-en x x x x x x 25 x x x x šum₂-ma TA x x x x x x x x x x x x ina ŠA₃-bi UD x x x x x x x x x x x a-sa-par šu-x x x x x x x x x x x it-tu-ṣi x x x x i-x+x x x x x x ma-a bir-ti x x x i-ša₂-ʾa-al x x x x x i-da-bu-ub x x x x a-na {URU}x x x x x u₂-la-a x x x x x il-la-ka x x x x x x x x x x x x x-ra 03-šu₂ x x x x x x x x x x x x x lil-lik-u₂-ni x x x x x x x x x x {ANŠE}KUR.RA-MEŠ i-si-x x x x x x x x x x an-nu-rig {URU}E₂-bu-nak-ka il-la-ak a-na be-li₂-ia₂ a-šap-pa-ra {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ 05 me ša x x lil-lik-u-ni ina {URU}HAL.ṢU le-ru-bu i-x x x u₂ ri x x x x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ 02 me x x x x ša be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a ki-ma x x x-ṣu-ṣu x x x x x x a-a-ka x x x a-ki ša be-li₂ a-na ARAD-šu₂ iš-pur-an-ni ep-pa-aš₂ ša be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a x x x x x-an-ni ma-a šum₂-ma x x x x x SIG₄-HI.A-MEŠ ha-an-ni-u₂ x x x x x dan i-ba-aš₂-ši-i x x x ina ŠA₃-bi e-tap-aš₂ šum₂-ma a-se-me ma-a LUGAL ina {URU}de-ri il-la-ka a-za-bil u₂-še-rab {URU}i-si-ta-a-te ina ŠA₃-bi a-ra-ṣi-bi am-mar ša ta-ri-ha-an-ni A-MEŠ ina ŠA₃-bi a-šak-kan ša be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a a-du E₂ ni-lak-an-ni ma-a x+x x x x lu ra-ah-ṣa-a-ka TA pa-an LUGAL lu pal-ha-a-ka DINGIR-MEŠ-e-ka šum₂-ma a-dan-niš la ra-ah-ṣa-ku-u-ni x x il x x+x ma x x x x x x x+x šum₂-ma a-na-ku ina {URU}A-MEŠ-dur-na a-du E₂ {LU₂}A-KIN-ia {LU₂}A-KIN-ia TA pa-an be-li₂-ia₂ il-lik-an-ni iq-ti-bi-i ma-a {LU₂}EN.NAM ina {URU}A-MEŠ-tur-na re-eš ZID₂.DA.KASKAL.2 la aš₂-ši mu-uk a-na be-li₂-ia₂ lu-še-bi-la pi-iq-ta-at-ti be-li₂ a-du UD-mu-MEŠ 05 06 be-li₂ šum₂-ma a-na KUR-aš-šur{KI} šum₂-ma a-na {KUR}na-kir₃ {KUR}na-kir₃ be-li₂ il-lak ina {URU}A-MEŠ-dur-na ina {URU}zab-ban ina {URU}BAD₃-EN-DINGIR-a.a ṭe₃-e-mu be-li₂ liš-kun {URU}x x x {LU₂}A-KIN-ia {LU₂}A-KIN-ia ina ŠA₃-bi ar₂-hiš ina kal-li-i li-in-tu-uh a-du pa-an be-li₂-ia₂ DI-mu a-dan-niš ŠA₃-bi {URU}de-ri a-dan-niš DUG₃.GA ŠA₃-bi x+x ri x+x ša {LU₂}EN.NAM be-li₂-ia₂ lu-u₂ DUG₃.GA {1}aš-šur-rem₂-an-ni {LU₂}GAL-BAD-HAL {LU₂}GAL-BAD-HAL {LU₂}02-i x+x x x x x {LU₂}ARAD ša be-li₂-ia₂ UR.KU a-x x x x ina pa-ni-ia it-tal-ka a-na-ku aq-ti-ba-aš₂-šu₂ mu-uk ARAD ša be-li₂-ia₂ at-ta mu-uk x x x x x x x mu-uk mar-ṣa-ak mu-uk x x x x x x x x-man-ni mu-uk o TA x+x x x x x x x x x ina GIŠ.MI ša MAN la x x x x x x x iš-pur-an-ni ina {URU}de-ri ib x x x x x x x x {URU}de-ri il-x x x x x x x x iš-al-an-ni ma x x x x x x x x x-ṣi i-ba-aš₂-ši x x x x x x x a-na be-li₂-ia₂ aq-ti-bi x x x x x x x x x ša {1}aš-šur-rem₂-an-ni x x x x x x x x i-mah-ha-aṣ-ka ma-a ki-ṣir ku-ṣur u₂-ma-a a-na mi₃-ni be-li₂ ina x+x x x x x x x x x x x x-an-ni ina ŠU.2-šu₂ ba-i i-su-ru be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a TA E₂.GAL i-sap-ru-u-ni ma-a x x x x x x x+x ša be-li₂-ia TA E₂.GAL iš-pur-u-ni-ni be-li₂ am-mar sa-na-qi x x x {LU₂}x x x x x x a-na E₂.GAL be-li₂ i-šap-par am-mar ina ṣu-pur-ia e-rab-u-ni a-na be-li₂-ia₂ ad-dan am-mar x x u₂ x x x x-ti-iq {LU₂}ša-BAD-HAL-lum {LU₂}GIGIR ša pa-an {1}aš-šur-rem₂-an-ni i-zi-zu-u-ni ad-dan mi-ni ina {ANŠE}x x x x x a-na-ku {ANŠE}KUR.RA a-laq-qi u₂-ša₂-aṣ-bat
